channel.title: GPT-5 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in GPT-5 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Is GPT-5 really worse than GPT-4o? Ars puts them to the test.
item.description: It’s OpenAI vs. OpenAI on everything from video game strategy to landing a 737.

item.title: OpenAI brings back GPT-4o after user revolt
item.description: After unpopular GPT-5 launch, OpenAI begins restoring optional access to previous AI models.

item.title: Apple brings OpenAI’s GPT-5 to iOS and macOS
item.description: It’s unclear exactly how GPT-5’s new approach to model-switching will work here.

item.title: ChatGPT users hate GPT-5’s “overworked secretary” energy, miss their GPT-4o buddy
item.description: “I want my GPT-4o back and I’ll do anything to get it.”

item.title: OpenAI Finally Launched GPT-5. Here's Everything You Need to Know
item.description: OpenAI released GPT-5 on Thursday to both free users of ChatGPT and paying subscribers.

item.title: OpenAI Finally Launched GPT-5. Here's Everything You Need to Know
item.description: OpenAI released GPT-5 on Thursday to both free users of ChatGPT and paying subscribers.

item.title: OpenAI’s most capable AI model, GPT-5, may be coming in August
item.description: Sources say new model combines o3 reasoning with general GPT capabilities.

item.title: OpenAI jumps gun on International Math Olympiad gold medal announcement
item.description: Non-math AI model reportedly solves proofs at human speeds, but early reveal roils community.
